column4: I have a hub, but I don't know how to config my I.P address. My three computers(I tested for LAN) has thesame I.P adresses, how can I change their I.P so my computers can communicate to each one.
I have a hub, but I don't know how to config my I.P address. My three computers(I tested for LAN) has thesame I.P adresses, how can I change their I.P so my computers can communicate to each one.
You need to set the hub to be a dhcp server and the comps need to get their ip from the hub...
